lead_paragraph: Beno Udrih, the Miami Heat’s backup point guard, faces three months of rehabilitation after he has surgery to correct a tear in the connective tissue of his right foot.

headline.main: Heat Lose Guard to Foot Injury
headline.print_headline: Heat Lose Guard to Foot Injury

snippet: Beno Udrih, the Miami Heat’s backup point guard, faces three months of rehabilitation after he has surgery to correct a tear in the connective tissue of his right foot.
